component.name: AudioExample
component.script:
sub init() m.top.backgroundURI = "pkg:/images/rsgde_bg_hd.jpg"
audio = createObject("roSGNode", "Audio")
audiocontent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode") audiocontent.url = "http://www.sdktestinglab.com/Tutorial/sounds/audionode.mp3"
audio.content = audiocontent
m.top.appendChild(audio)
audio.control = "play"
m.top.setFocus(true) end sub
